Description:
.Reviewing of  drawing and calculation  interior fit-out & joinery shop drawings submitted by Sub-consultants and shop drawings submitted by contractors and issue OCS (Observation and Comments) review report and recommendations.
Responsible for all Joinery, final finishes& fit-out site inspection
Reviewing of the technical material submittals and RFIs from the contractors and provide responses.
Attending technical meeting with contractors and sub-consultants and do the necessary coordination as required.
Provide technical assistance to project managers and make coordination and technical consultation with other disciplines as required. Project hand over inspection at site and prepare report accordingly.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering or equivalent.
Experience in Five star hotel or Water villas required.
Minimum of 15 years of relevant experience Construction industry with comprehensive experience in Interior Architecture.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent technical, team-working and interpersonal skills.
